definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: Detector measured by automatic biochemical content of calcium.
sentences.chinese: 采用全自动生化检测仪测尿钙的含量。

sentences.english: You can go through the skin cosmetics store detector to determine your skin.
sentences.chinese: 您可去化妆品商店通过皮肤检测仪来测定您的皮肤。

sentences.english: The average optical density (OD) and inhibition rate were counted by Universal Microplate Spectrophotometer.
sentences.chinese: 通过酶联免疫检测仪计算平均吸光度值和抑制率。

sentences.english: At two of three monitoring stations operated by the municipal waterworks bureau, no radiation was detected.
sentences.chinese: 是自来水局得三台检测仪中，两台都没有检测到辐射。

sentences.english: In this thesis, the development of DSP-Based Instrument for Measuring Three-Phase Electrical Quantities is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了基于DSP的三相电量检测仪的研制。

sentences.english: The paper introduces a high-power detecting - device based on magnetostrictive effect for the NDT of steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 本义介绍了大功率磁致伸缩检测仪的研制。

sentences.english: Sure. I will check the card on the test machine first.
sentences.chinese: 好的，我先把交通卡放到检测仪上，帮您看一下。

sentences.english: By using the DIAG tool, check by the Digital Output Test device code "2E".
sentences.chinese: 使用诊断工具，检查数字输出检测仪代码“2E”。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a filter stick bonding strength detector and use method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种滤棒粘结强度检测仪及其使用方法。

sentences.english: This article introduce that how to design an intelligent wire measurer in detail.
sentences.chinese: 文章较详细地介绍了智能线束检测仪的设计。

sentences.english: But ultrasonic detectors should deal with that.
sentences.chinese: 但是，超声波检测仪倒是能解决这个问题。

sentences.english: This paper introduces development method of portal pressure detecting instrument in gas-field.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种气田井口压力检测仪表的研制方法。

sentences.english: The paper briefs a series monitoring instruments for large diameter pipe gas flow.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一系列大管道气体流量检测仪表。

sentences.english: On line dyadic selective breeding water share checks an instrument.
sentences.chinese: 选配在线式水份检测仪。
